FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about crafting your perfect earphones
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What materials do I need to make earphones?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: To make earphones, you'll need drivers, cables, connectors, ear tips, and housing materials. Our app provides a comprehensive list of required components and recommended suppliers.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is it difficult to make my own earphones?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: With our app's step-by-step guides and video tutorials, making earphones is easier than ever. We break down the process into manageable steps, suitable for beginners and experienced DIY enthusiasts alike.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I customize the sound of my earphones?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! Our app offers guidance on selecting drivers and tuning your earphones to achieve your desired sound signature. You can create everything from bass-heavy to neutral-sounding earphones.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How long does it take to make a pair of earphones?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: The time varies depending on your experience and the complexity of the design. On average, first-time makers can complete a pair in 3-5 hours. Our app includes time estimates for each step to help you plan your project.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Do I need special tools to make earphones?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: While some basic tools are required, most are common household items. Our app provides a tool checklist and suggests alternatives for specialized equipment, making it easy to get started with minimal investment.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: EarCraft guides you through the process of designing and creating custom earphones. You choose materials, design elements, and acoustic preferences, and our app provides step-by-step instructions for assembly.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Do I need special tools to make earphones with EarCraft?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Most projects can be completed with common household tools. For more advanced designs, we provide a list of recommended tools and where to purchase them affordably.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I sell the earphones I make using EarCraft?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! EarCraft is designed for both hobbyists and entrepreneurs. We even offer tips on marketing and selling your custom earphones through our in-app resources.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What if I encounter issues during the earphone-making process?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Our app includes a comprehensive troubleshooting guide. If you need additional help, our community forum and dedicated support team are always available to assist you.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 EarCraft Pro. Crafting perfect sound, one pair at a time.

TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I never thought I could make my own earphones until I found this app. Now, I have a pair that fits perfectly and sounds amazing!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The customization options are incredible. I've made earphones for my whole family, each tailored to their unique preferences.
